snippet: Bart Chilton, a Democratic member of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, on Tuesday assailed a recent court ruling that overturned limits on speculative trading, calling it "deeply flawed" and vulnerable to appeal.
abstract: Bart Chilton, a Democratic member of the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, on Tuesday assailed a recent court ruling that overturned limits on speculative trading, calling it "deeply flawed" and vulnerable to appeal.

headline.main: Regulator Urges Appeal of Dodd-Frank Court Ruling

keywords.name: organizations
